snippet.title: Techtonica 1.0 Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Techtonica 1.0 is coming to Steam, Xbox and the newly-announced PlayStation 5 on November 7th!

The Going Up update (previously 0.6) has grown and morphed into full launch with a massive content release that's over a year in the making! We’re introducing a new desert biome, a world map revision and expansion, access to the elevator, the jetpack upgrade for the hoverpack, as well as new machines, production loops, intermediates, resources, and much more. And most importantly, a complete narrative with an exciting ending!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1457320/Techtonica/?utm_source=trailer&utm_content=v1-announce

Read the full announce here: Steam Announce Link

Feedback website: https://feedback.techtonicagame.com

=== Join the Techtonica community on Discord ===
https://discord.gg/techtonica

=== Learn more about Techtonica ===
https://techtoni.ca/ 

=== Find us on Social ===
TikTok - https://tiktok.com/@firehosegames
Twitch - https://twitch.tv/firehosegames
Reddit - https://reddit.com/r/Techtonica
Twitter - https://twitter.com/FireHoseGames 

#Techtonica is a first-person factory automation game with a gripping sci-fi mystery about mining your way out from the depths of an alien planet. Explore bioluminescent caves, mold destructible terrain with a black hole gun, and construct a massive subterranean factory. Dig your way toward answers and discover the secrets of Calyx alone or with friends in up to 4 player co-op.
